technologies.name: DreamWeaver
technologies.description: Dreamweaver is a development tool for creating, publishing, and managing websites and mobile content.

technologies.name: Windows Server
technologies.description: Windows Server is a brand name for a group of server operating systems.

technologies.name: Linkedin Sign-in
technologies.description: Linkedin Sign-In is an authentication system that reduces the burden of login for users, by enabling them to sign in with their Linkedin account.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Microsoft ASP.NET
technologies.description: ASP.NET is an open-source, server-side web-application framework designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

technologies.name: IIS
technologies.description: Internet Information Services (IIS) is an extensible web server software created by Microsoft for use with the Windows NT family.

technologies.name: Twitter
technologies.description: Twitter is a 'microblogging' system that allows you to send and receive short posts called tweets.

technologies.name: Glyphicons
technologies.description: Glyphicons are icon fonts which you can use in your web projects.

technologies.name: Twitter Ads
technologies.description: Twitter Ads is an advertising platform for Twitter 'microblogging' system.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Lightbox
technologies.description: Lightbox is small javascript library used to overlay images on top of the current page.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: Sendgrid
technologies.description: SendGrid is a cloud-based email delivery platform for transactional and marketing emails.
